element-citation.article-title: Toward long-term stable and highly efficient perovskite solar cells via effective charge transporting materials

ref.mixed-citation: Wang, Y., Yue, Y., Yang, X., and Han, L. (2018a). Toward long-term stable and highly efficient perovskite solar cells via effective charge transporting materials. Adv. Energy Mater. 8, 1800249.
